instructions: Make sure your phone or tablet is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your speaker or display. Open a Chromecast-enabled app. Tap the Cast button . Tap the speaker or display you'd like to cast to. When you're connected, the Cast button will turn from light to dark gray, letting you know you're connected. You can now cast audio and video to Google Home your device. To stop casting, tap the Cast button at the top of your device. Tap Stop Casting in the box that appears.
